overview: Summer Breeze - August 18th, 2018: Bloodbath is a supergroup featuring members of Katatonia, Opeth and Paradise Lost. The Swedish-British combo plays flawless Death Metal. In 2014, Paradise Lost singer Nick Holmes took over after Åkerfeldt had to leave again in 2012. With the gothic metal hero as a shouter, Bloodbath sound darker than ever. The towers also trembled at Summer Breeze 2018 in Dinkelsbühl in Middle Franconia.
title: Bloodbath - Summer Breeze 2018
